channel.title: .bat file to .bash file, please help me!
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm about to buy a VPS with Linux on it, but a .bat file is unable to run on linux caz its a windows code.
Can some1 transfer this code to a .bash file or something so i can rune my server on a Linux VPS?
[code]@echo off title Source 474 java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit[/code]
I hope for a fast reaction :D
Thanks anyway,
doomed1.

item.title: .bat file to .bash file, please help me!
